000101 00010 00000 0000000000101000 -- r2 = r0 | 40
010011 11111 00000 0000000000000100 -- r31 = nextPC, jmp to inst4:fib
010100 00000 00001 0000000000000001 -- print r1
010100 00000 00000 0000000000000011 -- halt
fib: 000011 00011 00010 0000000000000010 -- r3 = r2 < 2
000101 00001 00000 0000000000000001 -- r1 = r0 | 1
110001 00011 00000 0000000000010100 -- jmp to inst20:fibret if r3 != 0
000000 11110 11110 0000000000001000 -- r30 = r30 + 8
100001 11111 11110 1111111111111110 -- mem(r30 - 2word) = r31
100001 00010 11110 1111111111111111 -- mem(r30 - 1word) = r2
000001 00010 00010 0000000000000001 -- r2 = r2 - 1
010011 11111 00000 0000000000000100 -- r31 = nextPC, jmp to inst4:fib
100000 00010 11110 1111111111111111 -- r2 = mem(r30 - 1word)
100001 00001 11110 1111111111111111 -- mem(r30 - 1word) = r1
000001 00010 00010 0000000000000010 -- r2 = r2 - 2
010011 11111 00000 0000000000000100 -- r31 = nextPC, jmp to inst4:fib
100000 00010 11110 1111111111111111 -- r2 = mem(r30 - 1word)
010000 00001 00001 00010 00000000000 -- r1 = r1 + r2
100000 11111 11110 1111111111111110 -- r31 = mem(r30 - 2word)
000001 11110 11110 0000000000001000 -- r30 = r30 - 8
fibret: 010010 00000 11111 0000000000000000 -- r0 = nextPC, jmp to r31
